justification: Misreads B’s needs and preferences. B already has two Tier 1 RBs, so “desperate RB help” is inaccurate. B values stable floors and possession WRs; Caleb Foster (Tier 2 possession) fits that, while Rivera (deep-threat, volatile) and Wright (Tier 5 committee) don’t. The offer downgrades B’s lineup and contradicts their consensus-driven, risk-averse profile. Rationale is thin and acceptance probability is overstated.
